member.name: M:ifc.ifc_di.#ctor(ifc.ifc_ci,System.Byte)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ifc.ifc_di class using the specified ifc.ifc_ci and address for IFC-DI08.
member.param: Address for IFC-AI08, in range of 0 to 63. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_di.#ctor(ifc.ifc_ci,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ifc.ifc_di class using the specified ifc.ifc_ci and address for IFC-DI08.
member.param: Address for IFC-AI08, in range of 0 to 63. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_di.di_read(System.Byte)
member.summary: To read the digital input of a selected port.
member.param: Selected input port to read, in range of 1 to 8. (byte)
member.returns: Return the digital input status, true if the digital input status is cleared. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_di.di_read(System.Int32)
member.summary: To read the digital input of a selected port.
member.param: Selected input port to read, in range of 1 to 8. (int)
member.returns: Return the digital input status, true if the digital input status is cleared. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_di.di_read_all
member.summary: To read the all digital input of IFC-DI08.
member.returns: Return the digital input status in one byte. Bit 0 represent DI_1, ..., and bit 7 represend DI_8. Representative bit clear if the digital input status is cleared. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_di.di_c1con(System.Byte)
member.param: 1 to turn ON Counter 1 and 0 to turn OFF Counter 1. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_di.di_c1con(System.Int32)
member.param: 1 to turn ON Counter 1 and 0 to turn OFF Counter 1. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_di.di_c1con(System.Boolean)
member.param: True to turn ON Counter 1 and false to turn OFF Counter 1. (bool)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_di.di_c2con(System.Byte)
member.param: 1 to turn ON Counter 2 and 0 to turn OFF Counter 2. (byte)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_di.di_c2con(System.Int32)
member.param: 1 to turn ON Counter 2 and 0 to turn OFF Counter 2. (int)

member.name: M:ifc.ifc_di.di_c2con(System.Boolean)
member.param: True to turn ON Counter 2 and false to turn OFF Counter 2. (bool)
